name: Adventure Spirit
description:
Adventure Spirit is an exploration/adventure/survival game with graphics based on those from the atari 2600 (barely) with the biggest focus being exploration and hand-to-hand combat with enemies.

In the game you take control of a villager sent by his village to defeat the hostile animals and the bosses that are throughout the area, they can attack you from the beginning or be neutral and attack only when you hurt them so be careful with who you get in.

This game is still on a very early beta stage of development so it culd have a lot of glitches around there, feel free to report the glitches or tips you found in the comments/community

The game demo is now available! Download it, play it and enjoy it.

The game was programmed with Clickteam fusion 2.5,  the 2d sprites are made with aseprite in genereal, the 3d promotional renders are made with blender and the sounds and music made with lmms
